location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 16 of 1866 from Lewis Pelly, Political Resident in the Persian Gulf, on board Her Majestys Steamer Bereniceto Charles Gonne, Secretary to Government, Political Department, Bombay

mods.abstract: Letter informing the Government that the individual bearing the letter is Hajee Ahmed, Vazeer [Vizier] to the late Sultan of Muskat [Muscat], whom Pelly trusts in 'forwarding the true interests of his master'.
